original: Wal_2 svāgataṁ vo bhikṣavaḥ / supravrajyā vo bhiṣavaḥ / lābhā sulabdhā / kadācit karhicid
analyzed: svāgatam vaḥ bhikṣavaḥ su pravrajyā vaḥ bhiṣavaḥ lābhā su labdhā kadācid karhicit

original: āryāyatane pratyājāti indriyair avikalatā ajaḍatā aneḍamūkatā ahastasaṁvācakatā pratibalatā
analyzed: ārya āyatane indriyaiḥ a vikala tā a jaḍa tā an iḍa mūka tā ahasta sa vācaka tā pratibala tā

original: Wal_3 ahaṁ caitarhi śāstā loke utpannas tathāgato ’rhāṁ samyaksaṁbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṁpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttara puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā  #
analyzed: aham ca etarhi śāstā loke utpannaḥ tathāgataḥ rhām samyaksabuddhaḥ vidyā caraṇa sapannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttara puruṣa damya sārathiḥ śāstā

original: Wal_4 dharmaś ca deśyate aupaśamikaḥ pārinirvāṇikaḥ saṁbodhagāmī sugatapraveditaḥ / yad utāsmiṁ satīdaṁ bhavaty asyotpādād idam utpadyate /
analyzed: dharmaḥ ca deśyate aupaśamikaḥ pārinirvāṇikaḥ sa bodha gāmī sugata praveditaḥ yat uta asmin sati idam bhavati asya utpādāt idam utpadyate

original: yad utāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṁskārā yāvat samudayo nirodhaś ca bhavati /
analyzed: yat uta avidyā pratyayāḥ saskārāḥ yāvat samudayaḥ nirodhaḥ ca bhavati

original: Wal_5 tad idaṁ bhikṣavaḥ sudurlabhadurlabhaṁ yat kadācit karhicid āryāyatane pratyājāti indriyair avikalatā yāvat samudayo nirodhaś ca bhavati
analyzed: tat idam bhikṣavaḥ su durlabha durlabham yat kadācid karhicit ārya āyatane indriyaiḥ avikala tā yāvat samudayaḥ nirodhaḥ ca bhavati

original: Wal_6 tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ātmārthaṁ samanupaśyadbhiḥ parāthañ cobhayārthaṁ ca yāvad evaṁ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam //
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ātma artham samanupaśyadbhiḥ parātham ca ubhaya artham ca yāvat evam vaḥ bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam
